sense.def: Alternative Names jiu han 久寒.

① Etiological Agent. of cold evil staying in the body for a long time. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 16: 胃反朝食暮 吐，食訖腹中刺痛，此由久冷 , “If a person suffers from stomach turnover inthat what he eats in the morning will be vomited in the evening, and has a piercing pain when the food reaches the stomach, this is because of chronic cold ”.

② Pathological Condition of a han bing 寒病 , cold disease, which fails to heal over an extended period of time. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 15: 治久冷，或痢不痢 , “Cures chronic cold , with and without free-flux illness”.
